hymn.title: Naught have I gotten but what I received
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Saved by Grace
hymn.chords: | C - C/E - | F - C - | Dm - Dm/F - | G7 - C - | C - C/E - | F - Dm - | G - C - | F G7 C - | C - - - | C/E G/D C - | C - Am - | Am F E - | C - C7/E - | F - C/E - | F - C/E Am | Dm/F G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: Naught have I got -- ten but what I re -- ceived; Grace hath bes -- towed it since I have be -- lieved; Boast -- ing ex -- clud -- ed, pride I a -- base; I'm on -- ly a sin -- ner saved by grace! On -- ly a sin -- ner saved by grace! On -- ly a sin -- ner saved by grace! This is my sto -- ry, to God be the glo -- ry, I'm on -- ly a sin -- ner saved by grace!

lyrics.stanza: Only a sinner saved by grace! Only a sinner saved by grace! This is my story, to God be the glory, I'm only a sinner saved by grace!
